subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Boston University freshman Jack Eichel, expected to go no worse than No. 2 in the N.H.L. draft, may find lessons in the stories of other professionals who decided to stay in school.
snippet: Boston University freshman Jack Eichel, expected to go no worse than No. 2 in the N.H.L. draft, may find lessons in the stories of other professionals who decided to stay in school.
